# DBCA Turtle Data Viewer

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

Interactive turtle data preview for QA and analysis.
The app will be hosted at <https://turtledata.dbca.wa.gov.au/> (DBCA staff only).

## Installation

You can install the development version of turtleviewer2 from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("dbca-wa/turtleviewer2")
```
